overview:
RK Parthasarathy joined Ubicom in February 2009. He is responsible for Ubicom’s Marketing and Business Development. With more than 12 years of marketing, product management and engineering experience in processor, consumer electronics and communications markets, Mr. Parthasarathy is focused on driving go-to-market strategies and execution for Ubicom. Prior to joining Ubicom, Mr. Parthasarathy was the Director of Strategic Marketing at Synaptics, the leader in capacitive touch solutions for intelligent consumer devices. While at Synaptics, he built a new business model and product line from the ground up and ran the product line with success in Mobile phones and products in audio, display and other markets. Before joining Synaptics, Mr. Parthasarathy managed various marketing and applications engineering teams at Cypress Semiconductor for communications product lines. He was previously a part of chip design teams at DEC for the StrongARM SA1500 and the 21364 Alpha processors.

Mr. Parthasarathy holds an MSEE in Computer Engineering from Purdue University and a BE in Electrical Engineering from PSG College of Technology in India.
